name: Ramming into trees
description:
You wake up in a valley full of fruit trees, with a bicycle standing between your legs. Despite all the questions that cross your mind, you know what you need to do: ram into trees.

There are 3 types of fruits in this valley. You can eat apples, use olive oil as fuel, and trade lemons with the locals.

When you ram into a tree fast enough, its fruits are dropped. But if you go too fast, you lose some of the fruits you carry.

Controls:

  • Arrow keys/WASD: Move around
  • G/Click: Enable or disable engine, once unlocked
  • B/Click: Buy an upgrade

Screenshots are a bit outdated, because I had just enough time to automate the eating and refilling operations since then. Those were overlooked by some testers, who starved to death. In the game, I mean.
